Language: English

"SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:


Operating System: Windows XP / Windows 7 / Windows 8
Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo
RAM: 2 GB
Video card: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GTS, AMD Radeon HD 3850
Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible
Free space on hard disk: 15 GB


"DESCRIPTION:


In the early history of RESIDENT EVIL REVELATIONS 2 fans expect dramatic 
return of their beloved heroine Claire Redfield. Having survived the incident 
in Raccoon City, as described in the previous games Resident Evil, Claire is 
now working for the organization "Terra Saves", which is fighting bio terrorism.
